sourceDesc.p: Generated from the Open Office Document Books I've Read 2.0 (start Mar. 2008).odt.

listChange.change: Modified value and evidence contents on persPronouns to match TEI recommendations! Only the subject pronoun is listed, and "self-identification" is camel-cased instead of hyphenated.

With an update to Perspectography, I added information about people's pronouns to gender using the custom attribute persPronouns. This information was not applied systematically; I had previously left comments containing pronouns where I could not in good conscience fill in a value for gender, but did have the pronouns used in the person's bio.
Added XIncluded changelog entries for the generation of this file from the source ODT.
Added xml:lang for the entire document.
Added evidence to all gender elements. Default is "conjecture." There weren't many I was comfortable claiming as "self-identification."

person.note: Pseudonym of brother and sister team Yuko and Shin Kibayashi.
Pseudonym of spouses Ilona and Andrew Gordon.
